Posts.Content: Hi, I am in remission from breast cancer and am on tamoxifin now.  Was told that was the only one that fit me.  The problem?  Major hot flashes, we are talking 20 in a 24 hour period.  Dr. put me in neurontin then for that, which has helped.  I have a HSA which means no co-pay and we are talking like $80 a month for that alone.  Besides I am already on to many drugs.  Does anyone have any other ideas?  The Dr. thinks I will adjust to the tamoxifin and stop hot flashes, what is the experience out there for that?
Posts.Title: (No Subject)

Posts.Content: Barky Boys, are you a dog lover? I live alone and have to support myself so being tired is a big problem. The neurontin is helping, it is just so expensive and I get tired of taking so many drugs. I will keep on that drug till my Dr. appt. at the end of Jan.. Even when the hot flashes are in check, I still seem to have problems sleeping now, I am 55, so maybe age is my problem also. I just have to keep on going cause those dang dogs just won't do anything to help support me!
